structured.title: User Instructs Omi On Using Brakes
structured.overview: The user tells Omi that they are leaving after "flip six" and that Omi will need to use the brakes, prompting Omi to proceed and practice or apply brake usage. The context suggests guidance or instruction, possibly during a driving or equipment-use scenario, but no concrete timing or scheduled events are mentioned.

transcript_segments.text: Omi. So you're gonna have to use these brakes. Go ahead.
transcript_segments.speaker: SPEAKER_0
